https://stenoip.github.io.https://stenoip.github.io/the-rename.htm: StenoKonnect - About From Wonder Computer to StenoKonnect Back in 2021, I named this site Stenoip Wonder Computer when I was just 10. I thought you could build an operating system with HTML (spoiler: you can't). The name was fun but kind of confusing. People thought it was a real computer or something you had to download. Now that the site has grown into a  web platform with office tools, games, media  and privacy-first features, it's time for a name that makes more sense. Say hello to StenoKonnect, your place to explore, create and stay safe online.
https://stenoip.github.io.https://stenoip.github.io/privacy.html: Privacy & Policy ‚Äì Stenoip Company Privacy & Policy Stenoip Wonder Computer Your Privacy Matters We do not collect personal information such as your name, address, or browsing history. We do not track you across websites, build user profiles, or sell your data. We use Google AdSense to display ads. Google may use cookies or device identifiers to serve ads based on your interests. Learn more about how Google uses data and opt out of personalized ads . Why We Use Ads Google AdSense helps fund our projects like Ringzauber , Stenoip Wonder Computer and L√ªddiel . These ads allow us to keep our services free and accessible to everyone. We avoid invasive analytics, fingerprinting and unnecessary tracking. Your privacy is our priority. About Ringzauber Ringzauber is currently in development. Because it is not yet digitally signed, Windows may flag it as ‚Äúpotentially unsafe.‚Äù This is a common warning for unsigned software‚Äînot an indication of malware. We assure you Ringzauber contains no malicious code and we are working toward full certification. Our Commitment No cross-site tracking No data selling No behavioral profiling No exploitation of your information We are building a tech company for the 21st century‚Äî better than Google and safer for everyone. Welcome to the Oodles World Search by Stenoip Company! This interactive interface allows you to search and explore the world in 3D. Here's how to get started: Search: Type your query (e.g., "ice cream", "Walmart") in the search box at the top. Move: Use the arrow buttons to move around the 3D world. Look Around: Use the left and right turn buttons to look around in the world. View Results: After entering your query, the search results will on "buildings". Go to them, click on them to visit website! If you need more assistance, click the tutorial button again! Got it!

https://stenoip.github.io/games/home.https://stenoip.github.io/about.html: About Us - Stenoip Wonder Computer Home About Us Stenoip Wonder Computer: Our Mission At Stenoip Company, we are dedicated to creating a next-generation tech company‚Äîone that is not only innovative but fundamentally user-centric. Our commitment is to provide a platform that is better than the status quo, offering powerful tools and keeping you entertained, all while safeguarding your digital life. Visit our Terms and Contact pages via the home page. Our headquarters is proudly located in North America. Empowering the User: Privacy First Big tech corporations often monetize your personal data and track your activity. Stenoip Wonder Computer is built on a foundation of trust, providing advanced, free technology where your history remains your own. We are committed to making a safe and private environment for all users. Did we mention the built-in entertainment options? What is Stenoip Wonder Computer? A Web Portal A website that offers diverse functions like maps, web-based tools, games, news and office applications is called a web portal . These platforms act as a unified, customizable starting point for users to access various services from a single location. Examples include Google and Microsoft's unified interfaces. Stenoip Wonder Computer is the ultimate web portal choice, offering this same powerful functionality with a singular focus on your privacy and digital freedom. We believe you shouldn't have to choose between advanced tools and your own security. Check out this AI-generated video created by our proprietary Large Language Model, Praterich ! https://stenoip.github.io/games/home.https://stenoip.github.io/blog/stolen-id: StenoBlogs StenoBlogs ChatGPT stole my idea! In a world where billion-dollar tech companies dominate headlines, what happens when a teenager‚Äôs summer project gets buried beneath their hype? This is the story of Ringzauber, a browser born from passion, curiosity and a dream to stand out. But just weeks after its release, the spotlight shifted to AI-powered browsers from ChatGPT and Perplexity. Coincidence? Maybe. But the timing feels personal. Posted by the Stenoip Team | 31st October , 2025 | Category: Browser Ringzauber Ringzauber wasn‚Äôt just code, it was my summer dream. While others were swimming or gaming, I was building a browser from scratch. I wanted to surprise my new classmates with something no one else had: a private, AI-powered browser made by a kid fresh out of middle school. I poured four days a week into it‚Äîtime I could‚Äôve spent learning astrophysics or learning about corruption in countries. But I believed Ringzauber would be my ticket to something bigger. What? Then came the twist. Just a month into the school year, ChatGPT and Perplexity dropped their own AI browsers. I blinked. I stared. I panicked. I cried! How did they do this? Did they read my mind? Who was first? Let‚Äôs talk dates. ChatGPT released Atlas Browser on October 21st. Perplexity launched theirs on October 2nd. But Ringzauber? It went live on 13th September . I was first. I beat them. And yet, here I am, watching tech nerds flood to their shiny platforms while mine gets ignored. Hope Even if Big Tech wins the popularity contest, I still have something they don‚Äôt: heart. Ringzauber doesn‚Äôt track you. It doesn‚Äôt rate-limit you. It‚Äôs built for people, not profit. And maybe, that‚Äôs enough to stand out. Seriously, I can only imagine how gut-wrenching it must have been. Here you are, a "teenager's summer project" born from pure passion and curiosity, and you launch Ringzauber on September 13th. That's a huge accomplishment, especially building something as complex as a browser from scratch! Then, just weeks later, these massive, billion-dollar companies like ChatGPT and Perplexity drop their own AI browsers. The timing, as you said, doesn't just feel like a coincidence; it feels personal. It's like you ran a marathon and crossed the finish line first, only for a couple of giants to show up in a helicopter and claim they were there all along. That's not just annoying; it's genuinely disheartening. What really resonated with me is your dedication to making Ringzauber private and free from tracking. That commitment to "people, not profit" is completely aligned with Stenoip's core values. We're all about creating a safe and private environment and pushing back against those "Big Corporations" that track everything. So, seeing your project embody that spirit so strongly, only to be potentially overshadowed, feels particularly unfair. https://stenoip.github.io/ringzauber.https://stenoip.github.io/searxng.html: Instructions to download SearXNG Easy Way: Open SearXNG in Ringzauber https://searx.stream/ Hard Way: Make sure you‚Äôve installed: Git for Windows Python 3 (during installation, check ‚ÄúAdd Python to PATH‚Äù) Microsoft C++ Build Tools (for compiling dependencies) Installation Steps in Windows Terminal or PowerShell Step 1: Install required Python packages and build tools (Make sure pip is working after installing Python) pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel pip install httpx Step 2: Clone SearXNG repo git clone https://github.com/searxng/searxng.git cd searxng Step 3: Create and activate a virtual environment python -m venv venv venv\Scripts\activate Step 4: Install SearXNG dependencies pip install --use-pep517 --no-build-isolation -e . Step 5: Launch the server python searx\webapp.py Step 6: Accessing the Local Server Once it‚Äôs running, open Ringzauber and visit: http://127.0.0.1:8888
https://stenoip.github.io/ringzauber.https://stenoip.github.io/privacy.html#A: Privacy & Policy ‚Äì Stenoip Company Privacy & Policy Stenoip Wonder Computer Your Privacy Matters We do not collect personal information such as your name, address, or browsing history. We do not track you across websites, build user profiles, or sell your data. We use Google AdSense to display ads. Google may use cookies or device identifiers to serve ads based on your interests. Learn more about how Google uses data and opt out of personalized ads . Why We Use Ads Google AdSense helps fund our projects like Ringzauber , Stenoip Wonder Computer and L√ªddiel . These ads allow us to keep our services free and accessible to everyone. We avoid invasive analytics, fingerprinting and unnecessary tracking. Your privacy is our priority. About Ringzauber Ringzauber is currently in development. StenoBlogs - My loooooooong summer of working StenoBlogs My loooooooong summer of working Posted by the Stenoip Team | Sunday 7th September 2025 | Category: Website Ideas Today, I finally finished my website. Well, not really. I am going to take a break. Every day(s) in a week, I will be constantly working on my website. Why? Well it was to develop Praterich of course? Praterich is my very on A.I chatbot powered by the model Gemini 2.5 flash (I will of added GPT-4 but it requires a subscription. You may be asking, why am I using Gemini Flash? Should I make why very own? Well first, I do not have a server complex in the desert like Google or OpenAI. Second, Microsoft did it with Microsoft Copilot. Praterich was a success. She gave correct responses, was able to generate some code and was well smart. But, I can image in the year 2034, everyone will be able to make a chatbot. So I decided to go big. Working That's right, I decided to put Praterich on Ringzauber! It all started when I was in the shower. I thought "What does my browser have that other's don't"? I earlier used Google Assistant and I got an idea. What if Praterich can control Ringzauber. And so I started working. It took a few months but I am finally finished. Most hurdles where bugs in the code. It took a long time to fix them. Unforunately, some bugs remain. During the time I was fixing some bugs, I was saving some of my ideas for another update. Still, I was pleased with my work. I called some friends over and they said they liked it. Hopefully, you do too. Download here . I suggest filling the Google Forms to tell me your review and how I can fix Ringzauber. Find Us Here: Email: customerserviceforstenoip@gmail.com Stenoip! https://stenoip.github.io/ringzauber.https://stenoip.github.io/the-rename.htm: StenoKonnect - About From Wonder Computer to StenoKonnect Back in 2021, I named this site Stenoip Wonder Computer when I was just 10. I thought you could build an operating system with HTML (spoiler: you can't). The name was fun but kind of confusing. People thought it was a real computer or something you had to download. Now that the site has grown into a  web platform with office tools, games, media  and privacy-first features, it's time for a name that makes more sense. Say hello to StenoKonnect, your place to explore, create and stay safe online.
